sentences.en: Etymology: A'zone'is an area or place.
sentences.cn: 词源: “zone”一词是指面积或地方.

sentences.en: From the etymology speaking, anthropology is the study of science.
sentences.cn: 从语源学上讲，人类学是研究人的科学。

sentences.en: So the etymology of vichyssoise will come first.
sentences.cn: 那么先来看一下这个词的词源.

sentences.en: So the real etymology is that it appeared, evidently as slang, in around 1700.
sentences.cn: 真正的词源似乎是这样的：它作为俚语出现在1700年左右。

sentences.en: Some of it is about etymology, about the nature of words and their casual links with the elements around us.
sentences.cn: 有一些故事是关于语源学的，关于语言的本质以及那些词语与我们周围的元素的偶然联系。
关于嬉皮士的语源是有争议的.

sentences.en: The origin of OK became the Holy Grail of etymology.
sentences.cn: OK的出典成了词源学梦寐以求的圣杯.

trans.tran_en: the study of the origins, history and changing meanings of words
